body:
## What's Changed
* tiny spelling typo and a markdown tweak by @philclifford in https://github.com/wimpysworld/deb-get/pull/461
* Add reminder to move  custom user includes aside by @philclifford in https://github.com/wimpysworld/deb-get/pull/458
* Fix REDIR_URL in deadbeef by @natanjunges in https://github.com/wimpysworld/deb-get/pull/498
* Fix UPSTREAM_CODENAME for some Debian-derived distros by @natanjunges in https://github.com/wimpysworld/deb-get/pull/466
* Add neovim by @OhMyMndy in https://github.com/wimpysworld/deb-get/pull/502
* Added du-dust by @philclifford in https://github.com/wimpysworld/deb-get/pull/481
* feat: added Deborah by @ymauray in https://github.com/wimpysworld/deb-get/pull/526
* fix small typo by @philclifford in https://github.com/wimpysworld/deb-get/pull/527
* Add Teams-for-linux by @takov751 in https://github.com/wimpysworld/deb-get/pull/522
* Fix UPSTREAM_CODENAME for Debian 12+ by @natanjunges in https://github.com/wimpysworld/deb-get/pull/519
* added SmartGit by @chriswayg in https://github.com/wimpysworld/deb-get/pull/516
* Add Weylus by @dougmasten in https://github.com/wimpysworld/deb-get/pull/493
* [minor] no error if cache already empty by @pirate486743186 in https://github.com/wimpysworld/deb-get/pull/475
* Add google-cloud-cli gcloud-sdk by @OhMyMndy in https://github.com/wimpysworld/deb-get/pull/500
* Add helio-workstation by @takov751 in https://github.com/wimpysworld/deb-get/pull/524

## New Contributors
* @takov751 made their first contribution in https://github.com/wimpysworld/deb-get/pull/522
* @chriswayg made their first contribution in https://github.com/wimpysworld/deb-get/pull/516
* @dougmasten made their first contribution in https://github.com/wimpysworld/deb-get/pull/493
* @pirate486743186 made their first contribution in https://github.com/wimpysworld/deb-get/pull/475

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/wimpysworld/deb-get/compare/0.3.5...0.3.6

## What's Changed
* Add VirtualBox 6.1 by @philclifford in https://github.com/wimpysworld/deb-get/pull/396
* Add contributing guidelines by @natanjunges in https://github.com/wimpysworld/deb-get/pull/398
* removed extra doublequotes in Streamio function by @Xmetalfanx in https://github.com/wimpysworld/deb-get/pull/410
* "simplify" alternative install instructions by @Fuseteam in https://github.com/wimpysworld/deb-get/pull/405
* Fix package name of mullvad by @natanjunges in https://github.com/wimpysworld/deb-get/pull/407
* Fixes #443 by @philclifford in https://github.com/wimpysworld/deb-get/pull/444
* Improve regexes of grep and sed by @natanjunges in https://github.com/wimpysworld/deb-get/pull/408
* Added RetroArch by @Xmetalfanx in https://github.com/wimpysworld/deb-get/pull/416
* Added Pulse SMS Desktop Client by @Xmetalfanx in https://github.com/wimpysworld/deb-get/pull/417
* Added nomad by @elniko77 in https://github.com/wimpysworld/deb-get/pull/433
* Add Neo4j and Qownnotes by @LyzardKing in https://github.com/wimpysworld/deb-get/pull/451
* Grep the URL of the latest version of bitwig-studio from the download website by @natanjunges in https://github.com/wimpysworld/deb-get/pull/437
* add soundux installation by @rpodcast in https://github.com/wimpysworld/deb-get/pull/432
* Install correct versions of rstudio for jammy/focal by @LyzardKing in https://github.com/wimpysworld/deb-get/pull/450
* Add Min Browser. by @marosg42 in https://github.com/wimpysworld/deb-get/pull/442
* fix mergerfs saying there's an update when there's not. by @dhitchcock in https://github.com/wimpysworld/deb-get/pull/441
* Add feature to use PAT with GitHub by @philclifford in https://github.com/wimpysworld/deb-get/pull/457
* Add Plow by @luislavena in https://github.com/wimpysworld/deb-get/pull/455
* Add TeXworks and Lens by @LyzardKing in https://github.com/wimpysworld/deb-get/pull/452

## New Contributors
* @elniko77 made their first contribution in https://github.com/wimpysworld/deb-get/pull/433
* @rpodcast made their first contribution in https://github.com/wimpysworld/deb-get/pull/432
* @luislavena made their first contribution in https://github.com/wimpysworld/deb-get/pull/455

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/wimpysworld/deb-get/compare/0.3.4...0.3.5

## What's Changed
* Add mullvad vpn client. Close #43 by @GHMusicalCoder in https://github.com/wimpysworld/deb-get/pull/364
* Properly handle PPAs on distros that are not derived from Ubuntu by @natanjunges in https://github.com/wimpysworld/deb-get/pull/387
* Add tests and return non zero exit code when failed to install package by @OhMyMndy in https://github.com/wimpysworld/deb-get/pull/378
* fix missing public key error by @Fuseteam in https://github.com/wimpysworld/deb-get/pull/402


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/wimpysworld/deb-get/compare/0.3.3...0.3.4

## What's Changed
* Added "bottom" by @ymauray in https://github.com/wimpysworld/deb-get/pull/368
* Added "Tribler" by @ymauray in https://github.com/wimpysworld/deb-get/pull/369
* Heredoc help by @DiogoConstantino in https://github.com/wimpysworld/deb-get/pull/372
* Try source of apt-add-repository to determine appropriate parameters by @philclifford in https://github.com/wimpysworld/deb-get/pull/373
* Fixed : audiorecorder => audio-recorder by @ymauray in https://github.com/wimpysworld/deb-get/pull/376
* add waydroid by @Fuseteam in https://github.com/wimpysworld/deb-get/pull/320
* Fixed Ubuntu and Debian compatibility

## New Contributors
* @DiogoConstantino made their first contribution in https://github.com/wimpysworld/deb-get/pull/372

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/wimpysworld/deb-get/compare/0.3.2...0.3.3

## What's Changed
* Clean should purge the cache directory so that deb-get can update itself by @mrm48 in https://github.com/wimpysworld/deb-get/pull/326
* Support Ubuntu and Debian-derived OS using ID_LIKE in /etc/os-release by @onepunchdan in https://github.com/wimpysworld/deb-get/pull/343
* Fix small syntax error by @philclifford in https://github.com/wimpysworld/deb-get/pull/345
* Strawberry PPA code update by @Xmetalfanx in https://github.com/wimpysworld/deb-get/pull/346
* Added : output list of available software in CSV format by @ymauray in https://github.com/wimpysworld/deb-get/pull/349
* Add Debian sid (unstable) as supported version by @philclifford in https://github.com/wimpysworld/deb-get/pull/358
* New URL for GitKraken by @ymauray in https://github.com/wimpysworld/deb-get/pull/363
* deb-get: add AppImageLauncher ppa by @GHMusicalCoder in https://github.com/wimpysworld/deb-get/pull/353
* fix tailscale debian compatibility by @philclifford in https://github.com/wimpysworld/deb-get/pull/361
* getting debian working by @philclifford in https://github.com/wimpysworld/deb-get/pull/357

## New Contributors
* @mrm48 made their first contribution in https://github.com/wimpysworld/deb-get/pull/326
* @onepunchdan made their first contribution in https://github.com/wimpysworld/deb-get/pull/343
* @GHMusicalCoder made their first contribution in https://github.com/wimpysworld/deb-get/pull/353

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/wimpysworld/deb-get/compare/0.3.1...0.3.2

## What's Changed
* `deb-get help` shouldn't exit with a non-zero return code by @sparkiegeek in https://github.com/wimpysworld/deb-get/pull/299
* readme: user includes feature by @dreamcat4 in https://github.com/wimpysworld/deb-get/pull/277
* Add Stremio by @natanjunges in https://github.com/wimpysworld/deb-get/pull/279
* Add GPU-Viewer by @natanjunges in https://github.com/wimpysworld/deb-get/pull/282
* Add Cryptomator by @natanjunges in https://github.com/wimpysworld/deb-get/pull/283
* Add Xemu by @natanjunges in https://github.com/wimpysworld/deb-get/pull/284
* Add KDiskMark by @natanjunges in https://github.com/wimpysworld/deb-get/pull/285
* Add Typora by @natanjunges in https://github.com/wimpysworld/deb-get/pull/286
* Add KopiaUI by @natanjunges in https://github.com/wimpysworld/deb-get/pull/288
* Add Sleek by @natanjunges in https://github.com/wimpysworld/deb-get/pull/289
* Only set constant variables in deb_ functions when other variables are not needed by @natanjunges in https://github.com/wimpysworld/deb-get/pull/280
* Add BitWig Studio by @natanjunges in https://github.com/wimpysworld/deb-get/pull/292
* Add Delta Chat by @natanjunges in https://github.com/wimpysworld/deb-get/pull/293
* Add OpenAudible by @kingeejit in https://github.com/wimpysworld/deb-get/pull/298
* Keep readme up to date via cog by @sparkiegeek in https://github.com/wimpysworld/deb-get/pull/300
* Add Blanket by @natanjunges in https://github.com/wimpysworld/deb-get/pull/281
* Add LibreWolf by @natanjunges in https://github.com/wimpysworld/deb-get/pull/287
* Add Motrix by @natanjunges in https://github.com/wimpysworld/deb-get/pull/290
* Added Crossover by @kingeejit in https://github.com/wimpysworld/deb-get/pull/303
* Added Standard Notes by @kingeejit in https://github.com/wimpysworld/deb-get/pull/304
* Add Notable by @natanjunges in https://github.com/wimpysworld/deb-get/pull/291
* Added Flameshot by @kingeejit in https://github.com/wimpysworld/deb-get/pull/305
* Fixed package name for gamehub by @kingeejit in https://github.com/wimpysworld/deb-get/pull/306
* Added Bluejeans by @kingeejit in https://github.com/wimpysworld/deb-get/pull/307
* Fix RustDesk by @natanjunges in https://github.com/wimpysworld/deb-get/pull/308
* Use create_cache_dir to elevate privileges and create the cache dir when required by @natanjunges in https://github.com/wimpysworld/deb-get/pull/309
* Use HTTPS whenever possible by @natanjunges in https://github.com/wimpysworld/deb-get/pull/312
* Added audio-recorder by @Xmetalfanx in https://github.com/wimpysworld/deb-get/pull/321
* Add Proton Mail Bridge by @Forage in https://github.com/wimpysworld/deb-get/pull/317
* Use official name style by @Forage in https://github.com/wimpysworld/deb-get/pull/322
* Ubuntu logo update by @flexiondotorg in https://github.com/wimpysworld/deb-get/pull/323
* Add Support for Debian. Close #125. Close #162 by @flexiondotorg in https://github.com/wimpysworld/deb-get/pull/325
* Added Papirus Icon Theme by @kingeejit in https://github.com/wimpysworld/deb-get/pull/324
